* Recode new SAT (1600 scale) to ACT

RECODE new_sat (1600=36)

(560=11) INTO act.



* Usage example:

INPUT PROGRAM.
LOOP id=1 to 10.
END CASE.
END LOOP.
END FILE.
END INPUT PROGRAM.
EXECUTE.

COMPUTE new_sat=TRUNC(RV.UNIFORM(560,1600),10).
EXECUTE.

RECODE new_sat (1600=36)
